TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MediaFormat extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the information describing the format of media data, be it audio or video, as well as optional feature metadata.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateAudioFormat (string mime, int sampleRate, int channelCount);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateAudioFormat(string mime, int32 sampleRate, int32 channelCount) cil managed
static member CreateAudioFormat : string * int * int -> Android.Media.MediaFormat

Docs.param: The mime type of the content.
The sampling rate of the content.
The number of audio channels in the content.
Docs.summary: Creates a minimal audio format.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateSubtitleFormat (string mime, string? language);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateSubtitleFormat(string mime, string language) cil managed
static member CreateSubtitleFormat : string * string -> Android.Media.MediaFormat

Docs.param: The mime type of the content.

The language of the content, using either ISO 639-1 or 639-2/T codes. Specify null or "und" if language information is only included in the content. (This will also work if there are multiple language tracks in the content.)
Docs.summary: Creates a minimal subtitle format.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateVideoFormat (string mime, int width, int height);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.MediaFormat CreateVideoFormat(string mime, int32 width, int32 height) cil managed
static member CreateVideoFormat : string * int * int -> Android.Media.MediaFormat

Docs.param: The mime type of the content.
The width of the content (in pixels)
The height of the content (in pixels)
Docs.summary: Creates a minimal video format.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool GetFeatureEnabled(string feature) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of a MediaCodecInfo.CodecCapabilities feature.

Docs.exception: if the feature was neither set to be enabled nor to be disabled.

Docs.summary: To be added.

Docs.summary: A key describing the album mode for MPEG-D DRC as defined in ISO/IEC 23003-4.

Docs.summary: A key describing the attenuation factor allowing to adapt the dynamics of the output to the actual listening requirements.

Docs.summary: A key describing the boost factor allowing to adapt the dynamics of the output to the actual listening requirements.

Docs.summary: A key to retrieve the output loudness of a decoded bitstream.

Docs.summary: A key describing the Target Reference Level (Target Loudness).

Docs.summary: A key describing the AAC profile to be used (AAC audio formats only).

Docs.summary: A key describing the AAC SBR mode to be used (AAC audio formats only).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A key for applications to opt out of allowing a Surface to discard undisplayed/unconsumed frames as means to catch up after falling behind.

Docs.summary: A key describing the audio session ID of the AudioTrack associated to a tunneled video codec.

Docs.summary: A key describing the average bitrate in bits/sec.

Docs.summary: A key describing the closed caption service number.

Docs.summary: A key describing the number of channels in an audio format.

Docs.summary: A key describing the encoding complexity.

Docs.summary: If specified when configuring a video encoder that's in "surface-input" mode, it will instruct the encoder to put the surface source in suspended state when it's connected.

Docs.summary: A key describing the hardware AV sync id.

Docs.summary: A key describing the height of the content in a video format.

Docs.summary: A key describing the frequency of key frames expressed in seconds between key frames.

Docs.summary: An optional key describing the period of intra refresh in frames.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A key mapping to a value of 1 if the content is AAC audio and audio frames are prefixed with an ADTS header.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A key for boolean AUTOSELECT behavior for the track.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A key for boolean DEFAULT behavior for the track.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A key for the FORCED field for subtitle tracks.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A key describing the language of the content, using either ISO 639-1 or 639-2/T codes.

Docs.summary: An optional key describing the desired encoder latency in frames.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A key describing the desired profile to be used by an encoder.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: An optional key describing the low latency decoding mode.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A key describing the maximum number of B frames between I or P frames, to be used by a video encoder.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Instruct the video encoder in "surface-input" mode to drop excessive frames from the source, so that the input frame rate to the encoder does not exceed the specified fps.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
